quote: I love the rain. It's my favorite weather.
author: Kristen Wiig

quote: Conversation about the weather is the last refuge of the unimaginative.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: My style varies on my mood or the weather of the day.
author: Jennie

quote: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain.
author: Robert Frost

quote: If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.
author: Frank Lane

quote: What dreadful hot weather we have! It keeps me in a continual state of inelegance.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Sunshine is delicious, rain is refreshing, wind brace up, snow is exhilarating; there is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
author: Ruskin

quote: One can't predict the weather more than a few days in advance.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: A change in the weather is sufficient to recreate the world and ourselves.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Climate is what we expect, weather is what we get.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Shut the door not that it lets in the cold, but that it lets out the coziness.
author: Mark Twain

quote: I like the cold weather. it means you get work done.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: Who cares about the clouds when we're together? Just sing a song and bring the sunny weather.
author: Dale Evan
